mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bearing_inventory (box_text, box_number, quantity_in_stock, total_boxes, depository_id) VALUES (#{boxText}, #{boxNumber}, #{quantityInStock}, #{totalBoxes}, #{depositoryId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bearing_inventory WHERE box_text = #{boxText} AND depository_id = #{depositoryId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bearing_inventory WHERE box_text = #{boxText} AND depository_id = #{depositoryId}
mapper.select: SELECT bi.box_text, pi.box_number, bi.quantity_in_stock, bi.total_boxes, pi.quantity, pi.is_stocked, pi.iter, b.outer_inner_ring, b.model FROM bearing_inventory bi JOIN product_ids pi ON bi.box_text = pi.box_text AND bi.depository_id = pi.depository_id LEFT JOIN bearings b ON bi.box_text = b.box_text WHERE bi.box_text = #{boxText} AND bi.depository_id = #{depositoryId} AND pi.box_number = #{boxNumber} AND (b.depository = 'SAB' AND #{depositoryId} = 1 OR b.depository = 'ZAB' AND #{depositoryId} = 2 OR b.depository IS NULL) ORDER BY pi.iter DESC LIMIT 1;
